message:
Senior Hamas officials are making propaganda use of the words of the IDF spokesman yesterday regarding Hamas

Here are the things that senior Hamas official Ghazi Hamed said last night:

Hagari's statements are a significant admission and proof of the failure of the occupation in the war on Gaza.

Israel understands that it will not be able to eliminate Hamas even with hundreds of tons of explosives.

The disagreement between the leaders of the occupation is clear and Netanyahu brags even though he knows that the war has become futile."
event_breakdown:
Ghazi Hamed, a senior Hamas official, made some propaganda statements by using the words of the IDF spokesman, in which he claimed that the war in Gaza had been a failure for Israel. Hamed's statement implies that Israel understands that it will not be able to eliminate Hamas even with hundreds of tons of explosives.
Hamas is not known for its peaceful approach towards Israel.
